chapter.title: Introduction to &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE &THIS.EXAMPLE; Example
chapter.para: This example application plays the User Agent Server (UAS) role in a SIP session setup, using the JAIN SIP Resource Adaptor specified in the JAIN SLEE 1.1 specification.
The application receives and sets up new sessions. After setup is complete, a specific timer expiration will signal the application to terminate the session.
